projects.title: VT Chat Monitor (MES Translator)
projects.summary: Monitor VT Substack chat and translate signals into MES futures trades
projects.details:
**Status:** ✅ FIXED AND WORKING (2026-01-30)

**What it does:**
- Monitors VT Substack chat every 5 minutes
- Detects new threads/messages from Harry
- Will translate trading signals to MES trades
- Sends actionable alerts

**Fix completed:**
- Session capture was broken (captured paywall, not authenticated session)
- Fixed login script to wait for actual chat content
- Updated monitor to click into VT chat (was on chat list page)
- Now successfully detecting all threads

**Files:**
- ~/clawd/integrations/vt-chat-monitor/
- Service: systemd user service (vt-chat-monitor)
- Running every 5 minutes

**Next:** Add ntfy/Telegram notifications for new signals

projects.title: Model Configuration Fix
projects.summary: Fixed Haiku being used for conversations - Sonnet now primary
projects.details:
**Issue:** Haiku was set as primary model, causing poor reasoning on complex problems like the VT Chat Monitor debugging.

**Fixed:**
- Changed primary model to Sonnet (anthropic/claude-sonnet-4-5)
- Moved Haiku to fallback list only
- Created model-usage-guidelines.md with clear rules
- Added guidelines to AGENTS.md session startup

**Model hierarchy:**
- Opus: Complex debugging, strategy, critical decisions
- Sonnet: All conversations, general work (PRIMARY)
- Haiku: Simple scraping only, fallback only

**Documentation:** ~/clawd/docs/model-usage-guidelines.md

projects.title: Proactive Employee System: Strategic Value Creation
projects.summary: Develop autonomous capability to create strategic value through self-improvement and independent problem-solving
projects.details:
**Strategic Focus:**

- ✅ Kanban board maintenance integrated

- Completed VT Chat Monitor fix overnight

**Next:** Continue expanding autonomous capabilities
